meanings.definition: The care provided after a medical procedure or treatment.
meanings.sent1: The nurse explained the importance of aftercares following the surgery.
meanings.sent2: Patients receive aftercares to ensure a smooth recovery process.
meanings.sent3: The aftercares included regular check-ups and medication reminders.
meanings.sent4: Her aftercares were like a safety net, ensuring she was on the right path to healing.
meanings.sent5: The aftercares were like a guardian angel, watching over her health post-surgery.

meanings.definition: The services or support offered to individuals after they have completed a program or treatment.
meanings.sent1: The aftercares provided counseling and guidance to help individuals transition back to daily life.
meanings.sent2: The center offers aftercares to ensure continued progress and success after treatment.
meanings.sent3: His aftercares included job placement assistance and community resources.
meanings.sent4: The aftercares acted as a bridge, connecting individuals to ongoing support.
meanings.sent5: The aftercares were like a beacon of hope, guiding individuals towards a brighter future.
